Package tba

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    LightLocalizer
    The LightLocalizaer class performs localization through the use of a light sensor in terms of the robot's x and y position on the grid.
    LightLocalizerV2
    The LightLocalizerV2 class is the secon version od LightLocalizer.
    Navigation
    The navigation class controls how the robot will maneuver about the grid.
    Odometer
    The Odometer class keeps track of the position and angle that the robot has moved.
    OdometerCorrection
    The OdometerCorrection class corrects Odometer inaccuracies produced by wheel slippage and other sources error while navigating
    OdometryDisplay
    The Odometer Display class is used to display the odometer's readings on the robot.
    TBA
    The TBA class will be the main class for playing the game
    USLocalizer
    The USLocalization class uses ultra-sonic sensors to locate the walls surrounding the robot, where this information is used to locate the 0 degree angle.
    USLocalizerV2
    The USLocalizerV2 class is the second version of USLocalization.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    USLocalizer.LocalizationType  
    USLocalizerV2.LocalizationType
